## Biography

Bartosz is a Master’s student in Mathematics, with a strong interest in algebra, probability and statistics. He is currently the Treasurer of the Mathematics Student Research Group at Adam Mickiewicz University and previously held the same position in the Financial Engineering Student Research Group at the Poznań University of Economics.
